3281.verse: ۞ فَلَمَّا|Then when|100|107|141$قَضَىٰ مُوسَى|Musa fulfilled|147|161|13422$ٱلْأَجَلَ|the term|77|91|13423$وَسَارَ|and was traveling|137|151|13424$بِأَهْلِهِۦٓ|with his family,|119|133|13425$ءَانَسَ|he saw|74|81|13426$مِن|in|50|59|53$جَانِبِ|(the) direction|116|135|11227$ٱلطُّورِ|(of) Mount Tur|118|137|11228$نَارًا|a fire.|59|78|140$قَالَ|He said|68|87|309$لِأَهْلِهِ|to his family,|105|124|11349$ٱمْكُثُوٓاْ|"Stay here;|96|105|11350$إِنِّىٓ|indeed, I|78|85|312$ءَانَسْتُ|[I] perceive|98|112|11351$نَارًا|a fire.|59|72|140$لَّعَلِّىٓ|Perhaps|72|86|9049$ءَاتِيكُم|I will bring you|116|130|11352$مِّنْهَا|from there|89|102|246$بِخَبَرٍ|some information|132|139|13102$أَوْ|or|41|54|154$جَذْوَةٍ|a burning wood|121|146|13427$مِّنَ|from|50|75|156$ٱلنَّارِ|the fire|68|93|410$لَعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|154|193$تَصْطَلُونَ|warm yourselves."|140|153|13105$

3287.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|88|309$سَنَشُدُّ|"We will strengthen|148|178|13444$عَضُدَكَ|your arm|94|124|13445$بِأَخِيكَ|through your brother|158|188|13446$وَنَجْعَلُ|and We will make|134|149|13447$لَكُمَا|for both of you|120|145|6308$سُلْطَـٰنًا|an authority,|106|156|3368$فَلَا|so not|62|112|208$يَصِلُونَ|they will reach|117|167|4282$إِلَيْكُمَا‌ۚ|to both of you.|121|146|13448$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|Through Our Signs|142|150|408$أَنتُمَا|you two|74|90|13449$وَمَنِ|and (those) who|130|146|2707$ٱتَّبَعَكُمَا|follow you,|92|108|13450$ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ|(will) be the dominant."|175|183|5074$

3281.verse: And when Moses had completed the term and was traveling with his family, he perceived from the direction of the mount a fire. He said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire. Perhaps I will bring you from there [some] information or burning wood from the fire that you may warm yourselves."

3282.verse: But when he came to it, he was called from the right side of the valley in a blessed spot - from the tree, "O Moses, indeed I am Allah, Lord of the worlds."

3283.verse: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it was a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, approach and fear not. Indeed, you are of the secure.

3284.verse: Insert your hand into the opening of your garment; it will come out white, without disease. And draw in your arm close to you [as prevention] from fear, for those are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his establishment. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."

3285.verse: He said, "My Lord, indeed, I killed from among them someone, and I fear they will kill me.

3286.verse: And my brother Aaron is more fluent than me in tongue, so send him with me as support, verifying me. Indeed, I fear that they will deny me."

3287.verse: [Allah] said, "We will strengthen your arm through your brother and grant you both supremacy so they will not reach you. [It will be] through Our signs; you and those who follow you will be the predominant."
